SEARCH
Package work3

Class Table

java.lang.Object
work3.Table
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConcreteTable
public abstract class Table extends Object
Table is an abstract class representing a relational table with observer support. It allows attaching and detaching observers, and notifying them of changes.

  • Method Details

    • attach

      public void attach(Observer observer)
      Attaches an observer to the table.
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer to be attached.

    • detach

      public void detach(Observer observer)
      Detaches an observer from the table.
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer to be detached.

    • notifyObservers

      protected void notifyObservers(String action, int row, int column, String value)
      Notifies all attached observers of a change in the table.
      Parameters:
      action - The action that was performed (e.g., "Row added", "Cell updated").
      row - The row index where the change occurred.
      column - The column index where the change occurred, or -1 if not applicable.
      value - The new value after the change, or null if not applicable.
